def.title: Anonymous function
def.description: anonymous function is simply a function without a name. Anonymous functions can either be used as a parameter for another function, or it can be turned into a function expression.

subdefs: We can add event listeners using the anonymous function : el.addEventListener("click", function() { alert("Alert!"); } );
When we turn it into a function expression, we assign the anonymous function to a variable. The variable name will then act as the functionâ€™s name.
Like anonymous functions, arrow functions can be turned into function expressions.

subdefs: capturing will handle the outer (parent) elements event first, then the inner(child) elements
